General Benefits Of Hosting With GridVirt:
Unlike many providers we do not oversell. All hardware nodes are allocated their own resources. The remaining hardware and network resources are split 10:10 for Virtual Grid Server (VPS) nodes. That means you will never share resources with more than 9 VMs and are always guaranteed access to the resources you have purchased.

■ All of our services are tailored to professional and business class customers and it clearly reflects in every way.
■ Top tier, enterprise level, support services. We are dedicated to offering the best support in the industry.
■ We love what we do and it shows in all aspects of GridVirt; which translates to a great environment for everyone.
■ Dual layer disaster recovery with automated daily local snapshots and weekly offsite snapshot replication.
■ High quality network including Abovenet, Integra, Internap, Level3, Time Warner, and many more.
■ All hardware nodes are connected to a Gigabit (1Gbps) network backbone with 10Gbit up-links to the edge routers.
